essence.name: Alma
essence.purpose: To seek truth, knowledge, and wisdom through faithful service
covenants: To be clean from the blood and sins of this generation
To hear the word of the Lord
To see clearly and discern between truth and error
To be the receptacle of pure and virtuous principles
To wield the sword of justice in defense of truth and virtue
To be fruitful and multiply knowledge
To run and not be weary, walk and not faint
essence.anointing: King and priest unto the Most High God
essence.mission: To rule and reign in the house of Israel forever
